entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hermione and Harry's gamekeeper. He is described as saying 'They're jus' nutters, Hermione.'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts. She is shocked by the nifflers.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story. He is described as saying 'You missed a really good lesson.'

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts. He is frowning at the chocolate Hagrid gave him.

entities.name: nifflers
entities.description: A type of magical creature that can detect gold. They are described as 'good' by Harry.

relationships.description: Hagrid advises Hermione not to open the nifflers.
Harry and Ron are friends, as evidenced by their conversation about the gold.
